testcase.name: app
testcase.system-out: +--------------------------------------+ | MyApp - 0.1 | |--------------------------------------| | Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, | | consectetur adipiscing elit. | | Curabitur sit amet risus mi. | | * * * | | Copyright (C) 2021 Juno Roesler | | <juno.rr@gmail.com> | | Licensed under Apache License 2.0 | +--------------------------------------+ Usage: MyApp [options] Option Argument Description -c/--client <Host> Client host -s/--server <Host> Server host -r/--remote <Host> Remote host -t/--target <Host> Target host -p/--proxy <Host> Proxy host -pu/--proxy-user <String> Proxy user -pp/--proxy-password <String> Proxy password -k/--keystore <Path> Keystore file -kp/--keystore-pass <String> Keystore password -pk/--private-key <Path> Private key file -pub/--public-key <Path> Public key file -ca/--crypt-algo <String> Cryptography algorithm -n/--server-name <String> Server (Http Header) -u/--user-agent <String> User-Agent (Http Header) -b/--buffer <int> Buffer size in bytes -d/--direct-buffer - Use direct buffers -tp/--thread-pool <int> Thread pool size -q/--quiet - Dont print stuff --version - Show MyApp version --author - Show MyApp author --license - Show MyApp license -h/--help - Show MyApp help
